article-data.headline: Topic of the Day: The Best Fictional Universes
Disney XD to Air David Tennant Doctor Who Seasons
article-data.subHeadline: Starting May 9, and continuing on June 13.

article-data.headline: NBC Revives Emerald City
article-data.subHeadline: Their dark take on The Wizard of Oz has been given a 10-episode series order.
